questions.text: How well does the notebook describe the Dandiset?

options.label: Not at all or very poorly
Reasonably well
Very well

questions.text: How well does the notebook show how to load information about the Dandiset?

options.label: Not at all or very poorly
Reasonably well
Very well

questions.text: How well does the notebook show how to load basic information from an NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: Not at all or very poorly
Reasonably well
Very well

questions.text: How well does the notebook show how to load data from an NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: No data is loaded or is done very poorly
One piece of data is loaded
Two independent pieces of data are loaded
Three or more independent pieces of data are loaded

questions.text: How well does the notebook show how to visualize data from an NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: No data is visualized or is done very poorly
One piece of data is visualized
Two independent pieces of data are visualized
Three or more independent pieces of data are visualized

questions.text: Does the notebook create an advanced visualization involving multiple types of data from an NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: No advanced visualization is shown or is done ineffectively
At least one high quality advanced visualization is shown

questions.text: What is the quality of the plots in the notebook?

options.label: No plots are shown or are done very poorly
Reasonably good quality
Very good quality

questions.text: Are there issues with the plots in the notebook?

options.label: No issues
Some minor issues only
At least one major issue
Two or more major issues

questions.text: Is there excessive redundancy between the plots in the notebook?

options.label: No excessive redundancy between the plots
Some minor redundancy only
At least one major redundancy between the plots
Two or more major redundancies between the plots

questions.text: Are there unsupported conclusions in the notebook?

options.label: No unsupported conclusions
Some minor unsupported conclusions
At least one major unsupported conclusion
Two or more major unsupported conclusions

questions.text: Are there other issues with the notebook?

options.label: No other issues
